events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has classified the issue under the Refund category based on the customer's request.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! I'm Emily from customer support. I understand you want a refund for the wrong item you received. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and photos of the item you received so I can process your refund request?
Sure, my order number is 7854321. I’ve attached the photos showing the incorrect item I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund, which should be processed within 5 business days. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for your prompt response. I appreciate the quick resolution and look forward to the refund.
Your refund case is now resolved and closed from our side. Please check your email for confirmation and let us know if you need further assistance.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please contact us if you have any other issues.
This case has been formally closed as your refund has been processed successfully. Thank you for reaching out to our support team.
